intro.name: Suphadet Vatjanajaroenrat
intro.introduction: I am currently a software engineer at LINE BK, specializing in web development both frontend and backend. I have hands-on experience with DevOps, specifically in implementing CI/CD processes to automate deployment and unit testing within the pipeline. Additionally, I am experienced with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.

technologies.details: Git, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, ArgoCD, Zsh
AWS, GCP, Vercel, DigitalOcean, Huawei Cloud, Sentry, Grafana, Kafka

details: Reviewed and guided junior software engineers to ensure quality code.
Initiated company documentation and knowledge sharing with docusaurus.
Designed technical solutions and architecture to meet business requirements.
Led the development and design IT solution of a new UI solution for the LINE BK onboarding process by enhancing and refactoring the existing codebase.
Developed, maintained, and designed backend systems with Java Springboot that were handed over by another team to implement new features based on business requirements.
Implemented improvements to go-modules libraries for internal use.
Developed and optimized backend for an internal sales platform using Go, integrating lat/long coordination with MongoDB for geolocation features.
Implemented batch processing for report generation using Go and MongoDB, utilizing goroutines to enable concurrent execution and improve performance.
Migrated CI/CD pipeline from Jenkins to GitLab CI and Argo CD, aligning with standards provided by the platform team.
Maintained and initiated migration of legacy drag-and-drop based services, used for campaign requirements, to Go-based services.

Developed both backend and frontend in an AWS environment for a webview service integrated into the company's mobile application, fetching data from PeopleSoft and K2 systems to support features such as payslip viewing and organization chart display.
Implemented a service using Go to encrypt and decrypt files stored in an S3 bucket, providing a secure file storage solution for internal teams.
Researched and designed innovative IoT solutions for customers (Pre-sale), including both hardware and software components.
Developed proof of concept (PoC) projects using MQTT protocol, Node.js servers, Raspberry Pi, and ESP32 devices.
Programmed microcontrollers using Arduino IDE and PlatformIO to deliver efficient embedded system solutions.
